channel.title: @tobyblog’s Tobyblog - Nintendo
channel.description: All entries in Nintendo on Tobyblog
channel.item:
We Play Mario Party 10 http://172.20.10.2/posts/we-play-mario-party-10/ Fri, 15 Apr 2016 16:10:00 +0000 (Toby Marks) http://172.20.10.2/posts/we-play-mario-party-10/

The kids and I play Mario Party 10, the most inexplicably hated Mario Party of them all!

Conversations 2 – Thoughts on the Wii U http://172.20.10.2/posts/conversations-2-thoughts-on-the-wii-u/ Fri, 15 Apr 2016 16:04:00 +0000 (Toby Marks) http://172.20.10.2/posts/conversations-2-thoughts-on-the-wii-u/

TheVCubeSolver and I talk about the things we love about the Nintendo Wii U on a long drive home.

We Play Wii Play Playthrough http://172.20.10.2/posts/we-play-wii-play-playthrough/ Sun, 06 Mar 2016 12:20:00 +0000 (Toby Marks) http://172.20.10.2/posts/we-play-wii-play-playthrough/

TheVCubeSolver and I team up in this playthrough vid to reintroduce you to a seriously underrated classic on the Wii.

Conversations Series: The Nintendo NX http://172.20.10.2/posts/conversations-series-the-nintendo-nx/ Tue, 21 Apr 2015 10:12:00 +0000 (Toby Marks) http://172.20.10.2/posts/conversations-series-the-nintendo-nx/

Join TheVCubeSolver and I as we discuss the recently announced NX project from Nintendo, a new and novel system that could be the successor to the beleaguered Wii U. But what exactly is it? For the moment, all we can do is guess. But I think we have some good ideas.
